What we do

As parents we want to celebrate our kids birthday party with a memorable and original party but it is not always easy with our busy life. Between the preparation (all the planning and errands) and hosting the party it can be overwhelming.

With Chouparty you have all the fun without the stress.

Our parties are designed with kids and parents in mind. Our event planners are pleased to facilitate your birthday party at your home or location of your choice.

We come to your house and have a 30 mins consultation and follow up with a 1 hour meeting to go over all the details of the party. We take care of every details including set-up, break down, deco, invitations and activities. You can enjoy the party with the birthday kid.

We take the stress out of managing all the details and let you and your family enjoy the party!

Themes

Minecraft

Offline activities, games, art and crafts for kids who love Minecraft.

Superheroes

All superheroes have one thing in common: They like to stay active. We will dress-up, play super-heroes games and have some fun crafts for each guests.

Pokemon

f you have a Pokemon lover in your house, they will love this party. Each trainer will get to catch Pokemons with games and crafts.

Teaparty

All little ladies dream of having a tea party, dressing up and sitting down at a beautiful table with china cups and flowery table accents. So get ready to put on your fancy dress, a tea party hat and play fun games.

Spa

Every guest will receive a pampered basket. They will have mani-pedi, they will learn how to make a home-made facial and play games.

Fashionista

We will play fun games,have glitter tattoos and sparkle nails and every guest will receive sunglasses and feather boa.

Lego

This party is a big hit for kids of all ages, full of lego fun with tons of games and arts and crafts!

Beach

You love surfing, we will bring the party to Capitola Beach. We will play fun beach games and have a blast!

Camping

Outdoor Movies, popcorn, smoreâ€™s bar and fun games makes this a great birthday for everyone!

Party Package

price: $490

12 guests included (additional guests: $15 each)

The package includes all of the following:
Custom Made Invitations
Set Up and Break Down
Two Party Directors to Lead All Activities
Table Settings and Room Decorations
Tables and Chairs Rental
Plates, Napkins, Cups and Forks
Age Appropriate Crafts and Games

Who we are

Pamela LE VAN, founder of ChouParty, has always been in love with party planning, but even more with planning kids birthday party. She's been planning party since 2003. She looks forward to helping make your event one to remember for a lifetime and bring your vision to life. Our party coordinators are all experienced with kids and each of them have specials skills that will make your event a hit.

Our commitment

We want every birthday party to be a delightful experience for the kids and the parents. This is our passion and north star. We've always made each party a success and we are planning to continue doing so for a long long time.

Call us now

Call at 408-596-9296

or email us at hello@chouparty.com for a free consultation.
